block.create.clipboard.tooltip.behaviour: Opens the _Interface_. _Sneak-Click_ to _place_ it on a surface.
Some blocks' _settings_, such as filters, can be _copied (R-Click)_ and _applied (L-Click)_ elsewhere.
block.create.clipboard.tooltip.summary: _Keeps your notes_ and makes you look more professional.
block.create.controller_rail.tooltip.sum: A _uni-directional_ powered rail with _variable speed_, controlled by the _signal strength_ supplied to it.
block.create.copycat_panel.tooltip.behav: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
block.create.copycat_panel.tooltip.summa: _Converts_ any _full block_ into a decorative panel. Also accepts _Bars_ and _Trapdoors_.
block.create.copycat_step.tooltip.behavi: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to cycle _orientation_ or _powered_ state. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
block.create.copycat_step.tooltip.summar: _Converts_ any _full block_ into a decorative step.
block.create.creative_crate.tooltip.beha: Anything _extracting_ from this container will provide an _endless supply_ of the item specified. Items _inserted_ into this crate will be _voided._
Provides any material required by the Schematic.
block.create.creative_crate.tooltip.summ: This _Storage Container_ allows infinite replication of items.
block.create.cuckoo_clock.tooltip.behavi: Shows the _current time_ and plays a tune twice a day. _Activates_ once at _noon_ and at dusk, as soon as _players can sleep_.
block.create.cuckoo_clock.tooltip.summar: Fine craftsmanship for _decorating_ a space and _keeping track of time_.
block.create.flywheel.tooltip.summary: _Embellish_ your _Machines_ with this imposing Wheel of Brass.
block.create.haunted_bell.tooltip.behavi: Highlights nearby _Lightless Spots_ on which _Hostile Mobs_ can spawn.
block.create.haunted_bell.tooltip.summar: A _Cursed Bell_ haunted by lost souls of the Nether.
block.create.metal_bracket.tooltip.summa: _Decorate_ your _Shafts, Cogwheels_ and _Pipes_ with an industrial and sturdy bit of reinforcement.
block.create.nozzle.tooltip.summary: Attach to the front of an _Encased Fan_ to distribute its effect on Entities in _all directions_.
block.create.peculiar_bell.tooltip.summa: A decorative _Brass Bell_. Placing it right above open _Soul Fire_ may have side-effects...
block.create.placard.tooltip.behaviour1: _Adds_ the held _item_ to the Placard. _Emits_ a brief _Redstone_ signal if a matching item was present already.
block.create.placard.tooltip.summary: _Frame_ your _items_ in brass using this fancy wall panel. Safe for contraptions!
block.create.schematic_table.tooltip.beh: Uploads a chosen File from your Schematics Folder.
block.create.schematic_table.tooltip.sum: Writes saved Schematics onto an _Empty Schematic_.
block.create.schematicannon.tooltip.summ: Shoots blocks to recreate a deployed _Schematic_ in the World. Uses items from adjacent Inventories and _Gunpowder_ as fuel.
block.create.seat.tooltip.behaviour1: Sits the player on the _Seat_. Press L-shift to leave the _Seat_.
block.create.seat.tooltip.summary: Sit yourself down and enjoy the ride! Will anchor a player onto a moving _contraption_. Great for static furniture too! Comes in a variety of colours.
block.create.toolbox.tooltip.behaviour2: _Nearby_ _Players_ can hold the _Toolbox_ _Keybind_ to access its contents _Remotely_.
block.create.toolbox.tooltip.summary: Every Inventors' dearest Companion. Conveniently _holds_ a large amount of _8 Different_ item types.
block.create.turntable.tooltip.summary: Uses _Rotational Force_ to create Motion Sickness.
block.create.wooden_bracket.tooltip.summ: _Decorate_ your _Shafts, Cogwheels_ and _Pipes_ with a cozy and wooden bit of reinforcement.
create.block.cart_assembler.invalid: Place your Cart Assembler on a rail block
create.command.debuginfo.saved_to_clipbo: Debug information has been copied to your clipboard.
create.command.killTPSCommand.status.slo: [Create]: Server tick is currently slowed by %s ms :o
[Create]: Server tick is slowed by %s ms now >:)
[Create]: Server tick is back to regular speed :D
create.command.killTPSCommand.status.usa: [Create]: use /killtps stop to bring back server tick to regular speed
[Create]: use /killtps start <tickTime> to artificially slow down the server tick
create.contraption.minecart_contraption_: A mystical force is binding this Cart Contraption to the world
This Cart Contraption seems too big to pick up
create.display_link.invalid: Link has no valid target, try placing it again
create.display_link.title: Display Link
create.display_link.too_far: Targeted position is too far from here
create.display_source.label: Attached Label
create.elevator_contact.title: Elevator Contact
create.gui.adjustable_crate.title: Adjustable Crate
create.gui.assembly.exception: This Contraption was unable to assemble:
create.gui.assembly.exception.chunkNotLo: The Block at [%1$s,%2$s,%3$s] was not in a loaded chunk
create.gui.assembly.exception.column_con: Another Elevator is already targeting this column of contacts
create.gui.assembly.exception.noPistonPo: The Piston is missing some extension Poles
create.gui.assembly.exception.no_contact: Elevators require a horizontal _Redstone_ _Contact_ attached to the structure
create.gui.assembly.exception.not_enough:
Attached structure does not include enough sail-like blocks: %1$s
A minimum of %2$s are required
create.gui.assembly.exception.structureT:
There are too many Blocks included in the contraption.
The configured maximum is: %1$s
create.gui.assembly.exception.tooManyPis:
There are too many extension Poles attached to this Piston.
The configured maximum is: %1$s
create.gui.assembly.exception.too_many_c: Cannot attach more than one _Redstone_ _Contact_ to Elevators
create.gui.attached_computer.controlled: This device is being controlled by a computer
create.gui.attached_computer.hint: To use device manually, disconnect all computers and modems
create.gui.attribute_filter.allow_list_c: Items pass only if they have ALL of the selected attributes.
create.gui.attribute_filter.allow_list_d: Items pass if they have any of the selected attributes.
create.gui.attribute_filter.deny_list.de: Items pass if they do NOT have any of the selected attributes.
create.gui.config.overlay3: Click or drag with your mouse
create.gui.config.overlay5: Press ESC to exit this screen
create.gui.config.overlay8: to reset to the default position
create.gui.contraptions.network_overstre: It appears that this contraption is _overstressed_. Add more sources or _slow_ _down_ the components with a high _stress_ _impact_.
create.gui.contraptions.not_fast_enough: It appears that this %1$s is _not_ rotating with _enough_ _speed_.
create.gui.filter.allow_list.description: Items pass if they match any of the above. An empty Allow-List rejects everything.
create.gui.filter.deny_list.description: Items pass if they do NOT match any of the above. An empty Deny-List accepts everything.
create.gui.filter.ignore_data.descriptio: Items match regardless of their attributes.
create.gui.filter.respect_data.descripti: Items only match if their durability, enchantments, and other attributes match as well.
create.gui.schematicTable.title: Schematic Table
create.gui.schematicannon.option.dontRep: The cannon will never replace any Solid blocks in its working area, only non-Solid and Air.
create.gui.schematicannon.option.replace: The cannon will replace Solid blocks in its working area if the Schematic contains any Block at the Location.
The cannon will clear out all blocks in its working area, including those replaced by Air.
The cannon will only replace Solid blocks in its working area if the Schematic contains a solid Block at the Location.
create.gui.schematicannon.option.skipBlo: The cannon will avoid replacing data holding blocks such as Chests.
create.gui.schematicannon.option.skipMis: If the cannon cannot find a required Block for placement, it will continue at the next Location.
create.gui.schematicannon.slot.gunpowder: Add gunpowder to fuel the cannon
create.gui.schematicannon.slot.listPrint: Place a Clipboard or Book here to print a Checklist for your Schematic
create.gui.schematicannon.slot.schematic: Add your Schematic here. Make sure it is deployed at a specific location.
create.gui.schematicannon.title: Schematicannon
create.gui.sequenced_gearshift.title: Sequenced Gearshift
create.gui.speedometer.title: Rotation Speed
create.gui.stressometer.title: Network Stress
create.gui.terrainzapper.title: Handheld Blockzapper
create.gui.threshold_switch.title: Threshold Switch
create.hint.derailed_train: It appears this _Train_ is no longer sitting on a connected track piece. _Right-Click_ using a _wrench_ in order to relocate it to a nearby track.
create.hint.derailed_train.title: Derailed Train
create.hint.empty_bearing: _Right-click_ the bearing with an _empty_ _hand_ to _attach_ the structure you just built in front of it.
create.hint.empty_bearing.title: Update Bearing
create.hint.full_deployer: It appears this _Deployer_ contains _excess_ _items_ that need to be _extracted._ Use a _hopper,_ _funnel_ or other means to free it from its overflow.
create.hint.full_deployer.title: Deployer cannot activate
create.hint.hose_pulley: The targeted body of fluid is considered infinite.
create.hint.hose_pulley.title: Bottomless Supply
create.hint.mechanical_arm_no_targets: It appears this _Mechanical_ _Arm_ has not been assigned any _targets._ Select belts, depots, funnels and other blocks by _right-clicking_ them while _holding_ the _Mechanical_ _Arm_ in your _hand_.
create.item_attributes.blastable: can be Smelted in a Blast Furnace
create.item_attributes.blastable.inverte: cannot be Smelted in a Blast Furnace
create.item_attributes.has_name.inverted: does not have the custom name %1$s
create.item_attributes.max_enchanted.inv: is not enchanted at max level
create.item_attributes.renamed.inverted: does not have a custom name
create.linked_controller.press_keybind: Press %1$s, %2$s, %3$s, %4$s, %5$s or %6$s, to bind this frequency to the respective key
create.materialChecklist.blocksNotLoaded:
* Disclaimer *

Material List may be inaccurate due to relevant chunks not being loaded.
create.mechanical_arm.points_outside_ran: %1$s selected interaction point(s) removed due to range limitations.
create.mechanical_arm.summary: Mechanical Arm has %1$s input(s) and %2$s output(s).
create.minecart_coupling.two_couplings_m: Minecarts cannot have more than two couplings each
create.minecart_coupling.unloaded: Parts of your train seem to be in unloaded chunks
create.ponder.debug_baseplate.text_1: Blocks outside of the base plate do not affect scaling
create.ponder.debug_sections.text_1: This Section got merged to base.
create.ponder.shared.behaviour_modify_va: This behaviour can be modified using the value panel
create.ponder.shared.movement_anchors: With the help of Super Glue, larger structures can be moved
create.ponder.shared.storage_on_contrapt: Inventories attached to the Contraption will pick up their drops automatically
create.ponder.subject: Subject of this scene
create.schedule.applied_to_train: Train is now following this Schedule
create.schedule.instruction.throttle_edi: Affects the top speed of the Train
create.schedule.no_stops: This Schedule does not have any Stops yet
create.schedule.non_controlling_seat: Conductor needs to sit in front of a Controls block
create.schedule.remove_with_empty_hand: Remove current Schedule with an Empty Hand
create.schematic.error: Schematic failed to Load - Check Game Logs
create.schematic.invalid: [!] Invalid Item - Use the Schematic Table instead
create.schematic.tool.deploy.description: Moves the structure to a location.
Right-Click on the ground to place.
Hold [Ctrl] to select at a fixed distance.
create.schematic.tool.flip.description.0: Flips the Schematic along the face you select.
create.schematic.tool.flip.description.1: Point at the Schematic and [CTRL]-Scroll to flip it.
create.schematic.tool.move.description.1: Point at the Schematic and [CTRL]-Scroll to push it.
Instantly places the structure in the world.
[Right-Click] to confirm placement at the current location.
This tool is for Creative Mode only.
create.schematic.tool.rotate.description: Rotates the Schematic around its center.
create.schematicAndQuill.failed: Failed to save schematic, check logs for details
create.schematicAndQuill.instant_failed: Schematic instant-upload failed, check logs for details
create.schematicAndQuill.title: Schematic Name:
create.schematics.maxAllowedSize: The maximum allowed schematic file size is:
create.schematics.uploadTooLarge: Your schematic exceeds limitations specified by the server.
create.station.how_to: Use Train Casing on highlighted Tracks to create bogeys.
create.station.how_to_1: Remove bogeys by breaking the block on top.
create.station.how_to_2: Build carriages attached to one or two bogeys each.
create.terrainzapper.leftClickToSet: Left-Click a Block to set Material
create.toolbox.outOfRange: Toolbox of held item not in Range

create.track.leave_slope_ascending: Cannot leave this slope while ascending
create.track.leave_slope_descending: Cannot leave this slope while descending

create.track.slope_turn: Cannot enter or leave slope on a turn
create.track.turn_90: Can only turn up to 90 Degrees
create.track.turn_start: Cannot start connection from a Turn
create.track_signal.cannot_change_mode: Unable to switch mode of this Signal
create.track_signal.mode_change.cross_si: -> Allow passage if section fully traversable
create.track_target.missing: Right-click the targeted train track first
create.track_target.no_junctions: Targeted track cannot be an intersection
create.track_target.too_far: Targeted track is too far from here
create.train.relocate: Click a Track to Relocate %1$s to. Sneak-Click to abort

create.train.relocate.valid: Can relocate to here, Click to Confirm

create.train_assembly.bogeys_too_close: Bogeys %1$s and %2$s are too close to each other
create.train_assembly.frontmost_bogey_at: Frontmost Bogey must be at Station Marker

create.train_assembly.not_connected_in_o: Bogeys are not connected in order

create.train_assembly.single_bogey_carri: This Bogey type cannot support a carriage on its own

create.weighted_ejector.target_not_valid: Ejecting to Adjacent block (Target was not Valid)
death.attack.create.crush.player: %1$s was thrown into Crushing Wheels by %2$s
death.attack.create.cuckoo_clock_explosi: %1$s was blown up by tampered cuckoo clock
%1$s was blown up by tampered cuckoo clock
death.attack.create.fan_fire: %1$s got smoked by an Encased Fan
death.attack.create.fan_fire.player: %1$s was thrown into a smoker by %2$s
death.attack.create.fan_lava: %1$s was incinerated by an Encased Fan
death.attack.create.fan_lava.player: %1$s was thrown into a smelter by %2$s
death.attack.create.mechanical_drill: %1$s was impaled by a Mechanical Drill
death.attack.create.mechanical_drill.pla: %1$s was thrown in front of a Drill by %2$s

death.attack.create.mechanical_roller.pl: %1$s was thrown in front of a Mechanical Roller by %2$s

enchantment.create.potato_recovery.desc: Potato Cannon projectiles have a chance to be reused.
item.create.attribute_filter.tooltip.sum: _Matches items_ against a set of _attributes_ or _categories_. Can be used in _Filter Slots_ of Create's Components
item.create.blaze_cake.tooltip.summary: A Delicious treat for your hard-working _Blaze Burners_. Gets them all fired up!
item.create.builders_tea.tooltip.summary: The perfect drink to get the day started- _Motivating_ and _Saturating._
item.create.copper_backtank.tooltip.beha: Provides _Pressurized_ _Air_ to Equipment that requires it.
_Collects_ _Pressurized_ _Air_ at a rate depending on the Rotational Speed.
Wielder _descends_ more _quickly_ in liquids. Grants the ability to _walk_ and _jump_ underwater. Wielder also is no longer affected by _Mechanical_ _Belts_.
A pair of _heavy_ _boots_, allowing for better traversal of the Ocean floor.
item.create.copper_diving_helmet.tooltip: Provides the _Water Breathing_ effect, slowly draining _Air Pressure_ from the Backtank.
Together with a _Backtank_, allows the wielder to _breathe_ _underwater_ for an extended amount of time.
item.create.crafting_blueprint.behaviour: Opens a _Crafting_ _menu_ allowing you to _configure_ a _recipe_ and items to display.
_Applies_ the _configured_ _recipe_ with matching Ingredients found in your _Inventory_. _Sneak_ to craft up to a _Stack_ of items.
item.create.crafting_blueprint.tooltip.s: _Placed_ on a wall, it can be used to _specify_ _ingredient_ _arrangements_ for easier manual crafting. Each slot represents a Recipe.
A very special treat for your _Blaze Burners_. After eating this cake, Blaze Burners will _never run out of fuel_.
item.create.empty_schematic.tooltip.summ: Used as a recipe ingredient and for writing at the _Schematic Table_.
item.create.experience_nugget.tooltip.su: A speck of _inspiration_ from your fantastic inventions.
item.create.extendo_grip.tooltip.behavio: Increases _reach distance_ of items used in the _Main-Hand_.
_No_ _Durability_ will be used. Instead, _Air_ _pressure_ is drained from the Tank
item.create.extendo_grip.tooltip.summary: Greatly _increases reach distance_ of the wielder. Can be powered with _Air_ _Pressure_ from a _Backtank_
item.create.filter.tooltip.summary: _Matches items_ against a collection of _items_ or _other filters_. Can be used in _Filter Slots_ of Create's Components
item.create.goggles.tooltip.behaviour1: _Kinetic components_ show added _Stress Impact_ or _Capacity_. _Stressometers_ show statistics of their _attached kinetic network_. Some other blocks reveal information such as item and fluid content.
item.create.goggles.tooltip.summary: Augments your HUD with _miscellaneous information_ about placed components.
item.create.handheld_worldshaper.tooltip: _Targeted block_ will become the _material_ placed by the shaper.
Applies currently selected _Brush_ and _Tool_ at the targeted location.
_Creative mode_ tool for large-scale _landscaping_ from a distance.
item.create.linked_controller.tooltip.be: _Toggles_ the controller. _Movement_ _controls_ are taken over while its active.
Enables _Bind Mode_, press one of the _six controls_ to bind it to the _Links' Frequency_.
Places the Controller into the Lectern for easy activation. (R-Click while Sneaking to retrieve it)
item.create.linked_controller.tooltip.su: Grants _handheld_ _control_ over _Redstone Link_ frequencies assigned to its _six_ _buttons_.
item.create.minecart_coupling.tooltip.su: _Chains_ together individual _Minecarts_, causing them to move as a group.
item.create.netherite_backtank.tooltip.b: Provides _Pressurized_ _Air_ to Equipment that requires it.
_Collects_ _Pressurized_ _Air_ at a rate depending on the Rotational Speed.
item.create.netherite_diving_boots.toolt: Wielder _descends_ more _quickly_ in liquids. Grants the ability to _walk_ and _jump_ underwater. Wielder also is no longer affected by _Mechanical_ _Belts_.
A pair of _heavy_ _boots_, allowing for better traversal of the Ocean floor, including Oceans made of Lava.
item.create.netherite_diving_helmet.tool: Provides immunity to _Fire_ and _Lava_, slowly draining _Air Pressure_ from the Backtank. Also grants _improved vision_ in Lava
Together with a _Netherite Backtank_, this can protect you from _extreme heat_. To be effective, _Legs and Feet_ have to be covered in _Netherite_, too.
item.create.potato_cannon.tooltip.behavi: _No_ _Durability_ will be used. Instead, _Air_ _pressure_ is drained from the Tank
item.create.potato_cannon.tooltip.summar: Launches your home-grown vegetables at Enemies. Can be powered with _Air_ _Pressure_ from a _Backtank_
item.create.sand_paper.tooltip.behaviour: Applies polish to items held in the _offhand_ or lying on the _floor_ when _looking at them_
item.create.sand_paper.tooltip.summary: Can be used to _refine materials_. The process can be automated with a Deployer.
item.create.schematic.tooltip.behaviour1: Can be positioned using the Tools on Screen.
item.create.schematic.tooltip.summary: Holds a structure to be positioned and placed into the world. Position the Hologram as desired and use a _Schematicannon_ to build it.
Select two _corner points_ using _R-Click_. Hold _Ctrl_ and Scroll to select locations mid-air.
_Ctrl-Scroll_ on the faces to adjust the size, then R-Click again to Save.
Used for _saving a Structure_ in your world to a _.nbt file_.
item.create.tree_fertilizer.tooltip.beha: Creates a tree _regardless_ of its _spacing conditions_
item.create.tree_fertilizer.tooltip.summ: A powerful combination of minerals useful for _growing saplings_ in tight spaces.
item.create.wand_of_symmetry.tooltip.beh: _Creates_ or _Moves_ its Mirror. _Sneak_ while using to open the _Configuration Interface_
item.create.wand_of_symmetry.tooltip.sum: _Mirrors Block placement_ while present in any _Hotbar Slot_.
item.create.wrench.tooltip.behaviour1: _Rotates components_ around the clicked face. _Sneak_ while interacting to _dismantle_ components.
item.create.wrench.tooltip.summary: Multi-purpose tool for working with your kinetic contraptions.
